EmailTemplate.subject: Incredible 30% OFF Savings!

View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Black Friday Starts NOW! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Office-Supplies/_/N-af2?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> when you spend $100 or more on office supplies. Use code 2019BFR at checkout. Check Out Our Deal Centre <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Post-It-Sticky-Notes/_/N-1z0czraZalv?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> UP TO 50% OFF Post-It Notes Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Post-It-Sticky-Notes/_/N-1z0czraZalv?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Journals-Professional-Notebooks/_/N-1z0czraZbc7?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> UP TO 50% OFF Select Notebooks Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Journals-Professional-Notebooks/_/N-1z0czraZbc7?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Labels-Label-Makers/_/N-1z0czraZaiv?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> UP TO 50% OFF Labels & Label Makers Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Labels-Label-Makers/_/N-1z0czraZaiv?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Classroom-Storage/_/N-dv7Z1z0czra?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> UP TO 50% OFF Storage Products Shop Now
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Classroom-Storage/_/N-dv7Z1z0czra?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Desk-Accessories-Organizers/_/N-1z0czraZah8?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> UP TO 50% OFF Desk Sets & Accessories
Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Desk-Accessories-Organizers/_/N-1z0czraZah8?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Office-Machines-Supplies/_/N-1z0czraZbcc?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> UP TO 60% OFF Laminating Products Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Office-Machines-Supplies/_/N-1z0czraZbcc?cmp=EBBSBLACKFRIDAYCOUNTDOWN19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 2019BFR at checkout. Only valid on products found within our online Office Supplies department. Not valid on products found in the paper, copy paper, ink&toner, breakroom, cleaning & maintenance, services, printing, technology or furniture departments or on special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires November 29th, 2019.
